name: Retirony: I told you...I'm retired.
description:
The story of Glover Daniels...he was the best damned officer on the force. Key word *was* he's two weeks from retirement and just wants to be left alone.

A very late to the game project for Game Off 2022. Parody of the Retirony cliched-trope. Baseball themed villain addition is totally...baseless. Project began with >48 hours remaining in the Jam. Be kind.
